page.title: 08My Pet - Snowball the Rabbit
page.content: My pet rabbit is called{Snowball.}I sometimes call him{Snowy}.He is white with a pink nose.Snowball likes dandelion leaves and bran.Snowball is very friendly and never bites you.He is a dwarf rabbit and will not grow much bigger than he is now.About four weeks ago my daddy brought him into the house and put him on my knee.I stroked him for a while and then I put him down on the floor. I love Snowball and Richard,Mummy and Daddy like him too.When my cousins Matthew and Andrew come to see us they always stroke Snowy.Every Sunday morning Daddy and Richard clean out the hutch and I sometimes help.I am usually worried that Snowball might escape while we are doing his hutch.
